com.b2international.snowowl.core.history

Interface IHistoryService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISnomedConceptHistoryService, ISnomedReferenceSetHistoryService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHistoryServiceImpl, SnomedConceptHistoryServiceImpl, SnomedReferenceSetHistoryServiceImpl

    public interface IHistoryService
    History service implementations provide a list of past modifications for a particular component type.

    The detail of the returned list can be coarse eg. for RF2 imports and promoted tasks (which usually have a single, large commit), or more fine-grained in case of edits on a task (described with multiple, smaller commits).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<IHistoryInfo> getHistory(IComponentRef ref)
      Collects component history, which describes past modifications for the specified component.

    • Method Detail

      • getHistory

        List<IHistoryInfo> getHistory(IComponentRef ref)
        Collects component history, which describes past modifications for the specified component.
        Parameters:
        ref - the IComponentRef pointing to the component (may not be null)
        Returns:
        an object wrapping historical information, describing all changes made to the component
        Throws:
        CodeSystemNotFoundException - if a code system with the given short name is not registered
        CodeSystemVersionNotFoundException - if a code system version for the code system with the given identifier is not registered
        ComponentNotFoundException - if the component identifier does not match any component on the given task
